title: 'MAGAZINE' on Wired's website
content:
hey all,

I can't quite pick this, it's what's used for the word 'magazine' here: [http://www.wired.com/magazine/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033628/http:/www.wired.com/magazine/ "http://www.wired.com/magazine/")

thanks :-)
author: Sye

comments.content:
Not sure if its a match but looks like Eurostile Bold.

António
Doesn’t ring a bell. But then we had some Wired stuff here that turned out to be custom fonts.
As Jan said, it's Hoefler & Frere-Jones' custom Vitesse Sans. [This thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803033628/http:/typophile.com/node/61287) gives you the best look at it in action.
